title: How do I teach myself to NOT TYPE? [Help]
body:
I have been grinding out ranked games and I have been doing above average (A- grade on average?) but I feel like typing is really getting in the way of my performance. I use chat to try to motivate teammates with simple "we got this" and shot calls and summoner timers but I'm having trouble controlling myself with negative people. I never initiate any negative comments but as soon as someone goes "this team is f***ing useless" I get emotional and start typing back when I shouldn't.

I shouldn't type like this but I find it hard to stop myself. I know it's the wrong choice but I can't stop myself in-game. 

Any tips? Please?

replies.body: Don't be afraid to just mute them and move on at the first hint of outright negativity.  League games are too short to worry about the nay-sayers, just focus on the parts of the game that you have direct control over, like YOUR gameplay, and YOUR mentality.  Make each game a quest to better yourself instead of a quest to win, and even the losses can feel like victory.

Disable the Enter key in league with the Windows API. It works well for me. You can still surrender. Remake votes require an alt-tab & ahk exit though.

You can run this AutoHotKey file: https://pastebin.com/raw/QWChyCHa

And it's been officially condoned by a Riot employee in another thread.

You can also set a Windows Firewall Outbound Rule for Remote Port 5223 if you don't want to see the pre/post-game chat.

/mute all 
AND IN LOW ELO TURN OFF ALL CHAT
this is the single most important thing in low elo, just do this I promise you will climb at least 1 teir division

The best thing to do is improve your mentality. I know that isn't what you want to hear, but it is the best long term solution. You have to learn to not tilt and do your best in spite of what is going on. In the meantime, what you can do is say it out loud (just not in chat) if you must say it, or type it and then his escape instead of enter so it doesn't go through.

Yes. You have to basically better yourself by changing your own mindset. If someone starts flaming, just mute them and move on. Its amazing how fast you forget they were flaming if you mute them and focus on the game.

Play your best and try to carry. If you play bad but your teamate is super fed try to help him carry. If your teamates are being negative mute.
If you are fed tell your team what to do and that if they want to win they need to let you carry.
